member.summary: Gets the command id of the control.

member.summary: Returns the generated command name used when calling SetAddInInfo().

member.summary: Gets ribbon group that the control is assigned to.

member.name: P:SolidEdgeCommunity.AddIn.RibbonControl.ImageId
member.summary: Gets or set a value referencing an image embedded into the assembly as a native resource using the NativeResourceAttribute.
member.remarks: Changing this value after the ribbon has been initialized has no impact.

member.name: P:SolidEdgeCommunity.AddIn.RibbonControl.Label
member.summary: Gets or set a value indicating the label (caption) of the control.

member.summary: Gets or set a value indicating a macro (.exe) assigned to the control.

member.summary: Gets or set a value indicating the macro (.exe) parameters assigned to the control.

member.summary: Gets or set a value indicating screentip of the control.
member.remarks: Changing this value after the ribbon has been initialized has no impact.

member.summary: Gets or set a value indicating whether to show the image assigned to the control.

member.name: P:SolidEdgeCommunity.AddIn.RibbonControl.ShowLabel
member.summary: Gets or set a value indicating whether to show the label (caption) assigned to the control.

member.name: P:SolidEdgeCommunity.AddIn.RibbonControl.SolidEdgeCommandId
member.summary: Gets the Solid Edge assigned runtime command id of the control.
member.remarks: This is the command id used by the BeforeCommand and AfterCommand SolidEdgeFramework.ApplicationEvents. You also use this command id when calling SolidEdgeFramework.Application.StartCommand().

member.name: P:SolidEdgeCommunity.AddIn.RibbonControl.SuperTip
member.summary: Gets or set a value indicating the supertip of the control.
member.remarks: Changing this value after the ribbon has been initialized has no impact.

member.summary: Gets or set the telp URL that is shown in the browser if the user asks for help by using the F1 key.
